data.name: Barkskin
data.text: Give a minion +3 Health. Gain 3 Armor.
data.flavor: Make like a tree… and gain armor.

data.name: Biology Project
data.text: Each player gains 2_Mana Crystals.
data.flavor: Step 1: Grow giant evil strawberry.\nStep 2: ????\nStep 3: Rule Azeroth!

data.name: Claw
data.text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
data.flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

data.name: Earthen Scales
data.text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
data.flavor: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

data.name: Enchanted Raven
data.flavor: Once upon a midnight restive, Medivh pondered, feeling festive!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Floop's Glorious Gloop
data.text: Whenever a minion dies this turn, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
data.flavor: How much gloop could Floop's Gloop gloop if Floop's Gloop\ncould gloop gloop?

data.name: Forbidden Ancient
data.text: Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each mana spent.
data.flavor: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.

data.name: Frost Widow
data.text: Poisonous

data.name: Greater Jasper Spellstone
data.text: Deal $6 damage to a minion.

data.name: Jade Idol
data.text: Choose One - Summon a Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.
data.flavor: Shuffle or no guts.

data.name: Jungle Giants
data.text: [x]Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
data.flavor: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

data.name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
data.text: (Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
data.flavor:
In ancient woods, elves fought the curse
The demon’s shadow to disperse
But hatred raged and frail souls turned
Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

data.name: Living Roots
data.text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
data.flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

data.name: Mark of the Lotus
data.text: Give your minions +1/+1.
data.flavor: The mark of the Lotus is a little flower drawn in permanent marker on the ankle.

data.name: Naturalize
data.text: Destroy a minion.\nYour opponent draws 2_cards.
data.flavor: Another one bites the dust.

data.name: Raven Idol
data.text: Choose One -\nDiscover a minion; or Discover a spell.
data.flavor: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Savagery
data.text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
data.flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

data.name: Anodized Robo Cub
data.text: Taunt. Choose One -\n+1 Attack; or +1 Health.
data.flavor: It's adorable! AND OH MY GOODNESS WHY IS IT EATING MY FACE

data.name: Contamination
data.text: Give a minion Poisonous.

data.name: Darnassus Aspirant
data.text: Battlecry: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.\nDeathrattle: Lose a Mana Crystal.
data.flavor: She loves mana crystals, she hates mana crystals.   So fickle!

data.name: Dendrologist
data.text: Battlecry: If you control a Treant, Discover a spell.
data.flavor: He's teaching his little buddy to talk, but all it says is, "I am Gloop."

data.name: Dire Shapeshift
data.text: Hero Power\n+2 Attack this turn.\n+2 Armor.

data.name: Dire Shapeshift
data.text: Hero Power\n+2 Attack this turn.\n+2 Armor.

data.name: Druid of the Saber
data.text: [x]Choose One - Transform\ninto a 2/1 with Charge;\nor a 3/2 with Stealth.
data.flavor: That's saberTEETH, not like curved pirate blades.  That's a different kind of druid.  Druid of the Curved Pirate Blades.

data.name: Druid of the Swarm
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Druid of the Swarm
data.text: Taunt\nPoisonous

data.name: Druid of the Swarm
data.text: Poisonous

data.name: Druid of the Swarm
data.text: Choose One - Transform into a 1/2 with Poisonous; or a 1/5 with Taunt.
data.flavor: The Druid awoke from troubling dreams to find herself transformed into a giant spider.

data.name: Mana Treant
data.text: Deathrattle: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.

data.name: Mark of the Wild
data.text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2.\n(+2 Attack/+2 Health)
data.flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

data.name: Mark of Y'Shaarj
data.text: Give a minion +2/+2.\nIf it's a Beast, draw\na card.
data.flavor: Y'Shaarj had three sons: Mark, Theodore, and Chris.

data.name: Power of the Wild
data.text: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
data.flavor: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.

data.name: Sabertooth Lion
data.text: Charge

data.name: Sabertooth Panther
data.text: Stealth

data.name: Sabertooth Tiger
data.text: Charge, Stealth

data.name: Scarab Beetle
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Shapeshift
data.text: Hero Power\n+1 Attack this turn.\n+1 Armor.

data.name: Shapeshift
data.text: Hero Power\n+1 Attack this turn.\n+1 Armor.

data.name: Tortollan Forager
data.text: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
data.flavor: In the Tortollan tongue, Un’goro is known as the “Land of the Lost and Found.”

data.name: Treant
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Wild Growth
data.text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
data.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

data.name: Witchwood Apple
data.text: Add three 2/2 Treants to your hand.
data.flavor: An apple a day keeps the worgen at bay.

data.name: Wrath
data.text: Choose One -\nDeal $3 damage to a minion; or $1 damage\nand draw a card.
data.flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

data.name: Addled Grizzly
data.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1.
data.flavor: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".

data.name: Celestial Dreamer
data.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a\nminion with 5 or more\nAttack, gain +2/+2.
data.flavor: If you think her job is easy, YOU try falling asleep on cue.

data.name: Crypt Lord
data.text: [x]Taunt\nAfter you summon a minion,\n gain +1 Health.
data.flavor: The original fifth beetle!

data.name: Druid of the Flame
data.text: Choose One - Transform into a 5/2 minion; or a 2/5 minion.
data.flavor: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Druid of the Scythe
data.text: Rush

data.name: Druid of the Scythe
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Druid of the Scythe
data.text: Rush\nTaunt

data.name: Druid of the Scythe
data.text: [x]Choose One - Transform\ninto a 4/2 with Rush;\nor a 2/4 with Taunt.
data.flavor: She's a scythe for sore eyes.

data.name: Elder Longneck
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with 5 or more Attack, Adapt.
data.flavor: And so the bartender says, “Why the long neck?”

data.name: Feral Rage
data.text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
data.flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

data.name: Ferocious Howl
data.text: Draw a card.\nGain 1 Armor for each card in your hand.
data.flavor: Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon?

data.name: Flash Forward
data.text: Each player gains two Mana Crystals and draws two cards.

data.name: Gnash
data.text: Give your hero +3_Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
data.flavor: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

data.name: Greedy Sprite
data.text: Deathrattle: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
data.flavor: Sparkliest of the seven deadly sprites.

data.name: Grove Tender
data.text: Choose One - Give each player a Mana Crystal; or Each player draws a card.
data.flavor: Likes: Hiking and the great outdoors. Dislikes: Goblin shredders and sandals. (Can’t find any that fit!).

data.name: Healing Touch
data.text: Restore #8 Health.
data.flavor: 8 Health, no waiting.

data.name: Jade Blossom
data.text: Summon a Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
data.flavor: Meditating under a jade blossom is said to grant you wisdom, unless you have a pollen allergy.

data.name: Landscaping
data.text: Summon two 2/2 Treants.
data.flavor: We'll put a happy tree right here... and give him a little friend.

data.name: Mark of Nature
data.text: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
data.flavor: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

data.name: Mounted Raptor
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 1-Cost minion.
data.flavor: Clever girl!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Mulch
data.text: Destroy a minion.\nAdd a random minion to your opponent's hand.
data.flavor: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

data.name: Nature's Champion
data.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand and give it +5/+5.

data.name: Pilfered Power
data.text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal for each friendly minion.
data.flavor: The Hozen don't get paid much, but at least they get to keep any excess mana.

data.name: Savage Roar
data.text: Give your characters +2_Attack this turn.
data.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

data.name: Witching Hour
data.text: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
data.flavor: The gates to the Gilnean pet cemetary MUST remain locked at all times.

data.name: Astral Communion
data.text: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.
data.flavor: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?

data.name: Astral Tiger
data.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a\n copy of this minion into_your_deck.
data.flavor: Astral kitty litter is surprisingly hard to find.

data.name: Bite
data.text: Give your hero +4_Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor.
data.flavor: Chew your food!

data.name: Branching Paths
data.text: [x]Choose Twice - Draw a\ncard; Give your minions \n+1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
data.flavor: Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I –\nI took the one less traveled by,\nAnd got eaten by a slime.

data.name: Evolving Spores
data.text: Adapt your minions.
data.flavor: The most powerful mushrooms are commonly found in boxes marked with "?".

data.name: Fandral Staghelm
data.text: Your Choose One cards and powers have both effects combined.
data.flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree…" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

data.name: Flobbidinous Floop
data.text: While in your hand, this is a 3/4 copy of the last minion you played.
data.flavor: Of all the scientists, he has the most knowledge (when measured in volume).

data.name: Forest Guide
data.text: At the end of your turn, both players draw a card.
data.flavor: "Just sign this waiver, and we'll be on our way."

data.name: Ironwood Golem
data.text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
data.flavor: Marketed as a "rust-proof iron golem."

data.name: Juicy Psychmelon
data.text: Draw a 7, 8, 9, and\n10-Cost minion\n from your deck.
data.flavor: It's not juicy at all. IT'S JUST MESSING WITH YOUR HEAD.

data.name: Jungle Moonkin
data.text: Both players have\nSpell Damage +2.
data.flavor: The REAL angry chicken!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Keeper of the Grove
data.text: Choose One - Deal_2_damage; or Silence a minion.

data.name: Keeper of the Grove
data.text: Choose One - Deal_2_damage; or Silence a minion.
data.flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

data.name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
data.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.
data.flavor: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.

data.name: Mire Keeper
data.text: [x]Choose One - Summon a\n2/2 Slime; or Gain an\nempty Mana Crystal.
data.flavor: "Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?" \n"No.  I'm keeping it."

data.name: Oaken Summons
data.text: Gain 6 Armor.\nRecruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
data.flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

data.name: Poison Seeds
data.text: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
data.flavor: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Savage Combatant
data.text: Inspire: Give your hero\n+2 Attack this turn.
data.flavor: Maybe if you whistle a tune it will soothe him.  Yeah...  Try that.

data.name: Shellshifter
data.text: [x]Choose One - Transform\ninto a 5/3 with Stealth;\nor a 3/5 with Taunt.
data.flavor: Master of the Three Shell Monte.

data.name: Shellshifter
data.text: Stealth

data.name: Shellshifter
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Shellshifter
data.text: Stealth\nTaunt

data.name: Soul of the Forest
data.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
data.flavor: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

data.name: Strongshell Scavenger
data.text: Battlecry: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
data.flavor: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging…

data.name: Swipe
data.text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.
data.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

data.name: Twig of the World Tree
data.text: Deathrattle: Gain 10 Mana Crystals.
data.flavor: For druids who want to branch out.

data.name: Wildwalker
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +3 Health.
data.flavor: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

data.name: Wispering Woods
data.text: [x]Summon a 1/1 Wisp for\neach card in your hand.
data.flavor: We didn't actually fire the guy who named Dark Wispers.

data.name: Barnabus the Stomper
data.text: Battlecry: Reduce the\nCost of minions in your deck to (0).

data.name: Bewitched Guardian
data.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Gain +1 Health\n_for each card in your hand._
data.flavor: Amwitched. Beingwitched. Beenwitched.

data.name: Druid of the Claw
data.text: [x]Choose One - Transform\ninto a 4/4 with Charge;\nor a 4/6 with Taunt.
data.flavor: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

data.name: Druid of the Claw
data.text: Charge

data.name: Druid of the Claw
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Druid of the Claw
data.text: Charge\nTaunt

data.text: [x]Choose One - Transform\ninto a 4/4 with Charge;\nor a 4/6 with Taunt.

data.text: Charge

data.name: Druid of the Claw
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Druid of the Claw
data.text: Charge\nTaunt

data.name: Druid of the Fang
data.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, transform this minion into a 7/7.
data.flavor: The Druids of the Fang live in the Wailing Caverns. They wear cool snake shirts and tell snake jokes and say "bro" a lot.

data.name: Duskfallen Aviana
data.text: On each player's turn, the first card played costs (0).
data.flavor: Someone called her "Tweety". She didn't take it well.

data.name: Fatespinner
data.text: Secret Deathrattle: Give +2/+2 to all minions.@Secret Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions.

data.name: Fatespinner
data.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions and give them +2/+2.

data.name: Fatespinner
data.text: Choose a Deathrattle (Secretly) - Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.
data.flavor: Her clothing? Pure silk, of course.

data.name: Force of Nature
data.text: Summon three 2/2 Treants.
data.flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

data.name: Gloom Stag
data.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, gain +2/+2.
data.flavor: Majestic. Ethereal. Still pretty down in the dumps, though.

data.name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
data.text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
data.flavor: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

data.name: Living Mana
data.text: Transform your Mana Crystals into 2/2 Treants. Recover the mana when they die.
data.flavor: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

data.name: Lunar Visions
data.text: Draw 2 cards. Minions drawn cost (2) less.
data.flavor: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

data.name: Nourish
data.text: Choose One - Gain 2_Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
data.flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

data.name: Starfall
data.text: Choose One -\nDeal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.
data.flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

data.name: Verdant Longneck
data.text: Battlecry: Adapt.
data.flavor: Always sticking its neck into other people’s business.

data.name: Virmen Sensei
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2.
data.flavor: There is no carrot.

data.name: Webweave
data.text: Summon two 1/2 Poisonous Spiders.
data.flavor: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

data.name: Dark Arakkoa
data.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Give your C'Thun\n+3/+3 (wherever it is).
data.flavor: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

data.name: Dark Wispers
data.text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give_a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.
data.flavor: Don't worry; we fired the person who named this card.

data.name: Force of Nature
data.text: Summon three 2/2 Treants with\nCharge that die at the end of the turn.

data.name: Harbinger of Catastrophe
data.text: At the start of your turn, summon the highest-cost minion from each player's deck.

data.name: Jade Behemoth
data.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a\nJade Golem.
data.flavor: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

data.name: Mech-Bear-Cat
data.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, add a Spare Part card to your hand.
data.flavor: Crushes buildings with his BEAR hands.

data.name: Menagerie Warden
data.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Summon a_copy of it.
data.flavor: Please? Can I keep him? I promise to clean his cage every day.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Moonglade Portal
data.text: Restore #6 Health. Summon a random\n6-Cost minion.
data.flavor: Ain't no party like a Moonglade party ‘cause a Moonglade party got bears.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Recycle
data.text: Shuffle an enemy minion into your opponent's deck.
data.flavor: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

data.name: Spreading Plague
data.text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your_opponent has more minions, cast this again.
data.flavor: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

data.name: Starfire
data.text: Deal $5 damage.\nDraw a card.
data.flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

data.name: Tending Tauren
data.text: [x]Choose One - Give your other minions +1/+1; or Summon two 2/2 Treants.
data.flavor: That racial bonus to Herbalism finally paid off.

data.name: Ancient of Lore
data.text: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore #5 Health.

data.name: Ancient of Lore
data.text: Choose One - Draw a card; or Restore #5 Health.
data.flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

data.name: Ancient of War
data.text: Choose One -\n+5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
data.flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

data.name: Dreampetal Florist
data.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (7).
data.flavor: Unlike gnomes, dreampetals grow more than 3 feet tall.

data.name: Giant Anaconda
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your hand with 5 or more Attack.
data.flavor: Must be something it ate.

data.name: Knight of the Wild
data.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, reduce the Cost of this card by (1).
data.flavor: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

data.name: Malfurion the Pestilent
data.text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.
data.flavor: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."

data.name: Malfurion the Pestilent
data.text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.

data.name: Malorne
data.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your deck.
data.flavor: When Malorne isn't mauling hordes of demons, he enjoys attending parties, though he prefers to go stag.

data.name: Wisps of the Old Gods
data.text: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.
data.flavor: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.

data.name: Gloop Sprayer
data.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of each adjacent minion.
data.flavor: "Are you sure that's enough gloop?"\n\n"Hold on."

data.name: Grizzled Guardian
data.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Recruit 2_minions that cost (4)_or_less.
data.flavor: Favorite sandwich? Grizzled cheese.

data.name: Ironbark Protector
data.text: Taunt
data.flavor: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

data.name: Splintergraft
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a friendly\nminion. Add a 10/10 copy to\nyour hand that costs (10).
data.flavor: We're going to need some bigger tweezers.

data.name: Cenarius
data.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
data.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

data.name: Hadronox
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon your Taunt minions that\ndied this game.
data.flavor: The viziers of Azjol-Nerub released Hadronox as a last-ditch effort to hold back the Lich King. They did so by VERY carefully scooping him up in a LARGE newspaper and releasing him.

data.name: Tree of Life
data.text: Restore all characters to full Health.
data.flavor: Healing: It grows on trees!

data.name: Volcanic Lumberer
data.text: Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
data.flavor: The roots, the roots, the roots is on fire!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Aviana
data.text: Your minions cost (1).
data.flavor: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

data.name: Kun the Forgotten King
data.text: Choose One - Gain 10 Armor; or Refresh your Mana Crystals.
data.flavor: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

data.name: Mulchmuncher
data.text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly Treant that died this game.
data.flavor: The latest advancement in\nhippo-botany.

data.name: Tyrantus
data.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
data.flavor: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

data.name: Ultimate Infestation
data.text: [x]Deal $5 damage. Draw\n5 cards. Gain 5 Armor.\nSummon a 5/5 Ghoul.
data.flavor: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.
